revision.text: The '''Farm''' is a location in [[Kanto]] where [[Berries]] can be planted. Harvesting them yields [[Farming Points]] {{Farmpoints}} and more of the same type of Berry. Occasionally, mutations can occur when Berries are planted in certain configurations. The Farm is unlocked upon reaching Kanto '''Route 14''' and obtaining the [[Wailmer pail]].
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
